verses.verse: When<WH3588> Jethro,<WH3503> the priest<WH3548> of Midian,<WH4080> Moses'<WH4872> father<WH2859> in law,<WH2859> heard<WH8085> of all<WH3605> that God<WH430> had done<WH6213> for Moses,<WH4872> and for Israel<WH3478> his people,<WH5971> and that the LORD<WH3068> had brought<WH3318> Israel<WH3478> out of Egypt;<WH4714>
Then Jethro,<WH3503> Moses'<WH4872> father<WH2859> in law,<WH2859> took<WH3947> Zipporah,<WH6855> Moses'<WH4872> wife,<WH802> after<WH310> he had sent<WH7964> her back,
And her two<WH8147> sons;<WH1121> of which<WH834> the name<WH8034> of the one<WH259> was Gershom;<WH1648> for he said,<WH559> I have been<WH1961> an alien<WH1616> in a strange<WH5237> land:<WH776>
And the name<WH8034> of the other<WH259> was Eliezer;<WH461> for the God<WH430> of my father,<WH1> said he, was my help,<WH5828> and delivered<WH5337> me from the sword<WH2719> of Pharaoh:<WH6547>

And Jethro,<WH3503> Moses'<WH4872> father<WH2859> in law,<WH2859> came<WH935> with his sons<WH1121> and his wife<WH802> to Moses<WH4872> into<WH413> the wilderness,<WH4057> where<WH834> <WH8033> he encamped<WH2583> at the mount<WH2022> of God:<WH430>
And he said<WH559> to Moses,<WH4872> I your father<WH2859> in law<WH2859> Jethro<WH3503> am come<WH935> to you, and your wife,<WH802> and her two<WH8147> sons<WH1121> with her.

And Moses<WH4872> went<WH3318> out to meet<WH7125> his father<WH2859> in law,<WH2859> and did obeisance,<WH7812> and kissed<WH5401> him; and they asked<WH7592> each other<WH7453> of their welfare;<WH7965> and they came<WH935> into the tent.<WH168>

And Moses<WH4872> told<WH5608> his father<WH2859> in law<WH2859> all<WH3605> that the LORD<WH3068> had done<WH6213> to Pharaoh<WH6547> and to the Egyptians<WH4714> for Israel's<WH3478> sake,<WH182> and all<WH3605> the travail<WH8513> that had come<WH4672> on them by the way,<WH1870> and how the LORD<WH3068> delivered<WH5337> them.

And Jethro<WH3503> rejoiced<WH2302> for all<WH3605> the goodness<WH2896> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> had done<WH6213> to Israel,<WH3478> whom<WH834> he had delivered<WH5337> out of the hand<WH3027> of the Egyptians.<WH4714>

And Jethro<WH3503> said,<WH559> Blessed<WH1288> be the LORD,<WH3068> who<WH834> has delivered<WH5337> you out of the hand<WH3027> of the Egyptians,<WH4714> and out of the hand<WH3027> of Pharaoh,<WH6547> who<WH834> has delivered<WH5337> the people<WH5971> from under<WH8478> the hand<WH3027> of the Egyptians.<WH4714>
Now<WH6258> I know<WH3045> that the LORD<WH3068> is greater<WH1419> than all<WH3605> gods:<WH430> for in the thing<WH1697> wherein<WH834> they dealt proudly<WH2102> he was above<WH5921> them.

And Jethro,<WH3503> Moses'<WH4872> father<WH2859> in law,<WH2859> took<WH3947> a burnt<WH5930> offering and sacrifices<WH2077> for God:<WH430> and Aaron<WH175> came,<WH935> and all<WH3605> the elders<WH2205> of Israel,<WH3478> to eat<WH398> bread<WH3899> with Moses'<WH4872> father<WH2859> in law<WH2859> before<WH6440> God.<WH430>

And it came<WH1961> to pass on the morrow,<WH4283> that Moses<WH4872> sat<WH3427> to judge<WH8199> the people:<WH5971> and the people<WH5971> stood<WH5975> by Moses<WH4872> from the morning<WH1242> to the evening.<WH6153>

And when Moses'<WH4872> father<WH2859> in law<WH2859> saw<WH7200> all<WH3605> that he did<WH6213> to the people,<WH5971> he said,<WH559> What<WH4100> is this<WH2088> thing<WH1697> that you do<WH6213> to the people?<WH5971> why<WH4069> sit<WH3427> you yourself<WH859> alone,<WH905> and all<WH3605> the people<WH5971> stand<WH5324> by you from morning<WH1242> to even?<WH6153>
And Moses<WH4872> said<WH559> to his father<WH2859> in law,<WH2859> Because<WH3588> the people<WH5971> come<WH935> to me to inquire<WH1875> of God:<WH430>

When<WH3588> they have<WH1961> a matter,<WH1697> they come<WH935> to me; and I judge<WH8199> between<WH996> one<WH376> and another,<WH7453> and I do make<WH5414> them know<WH3045> the statutes<WH2706> of God,<WH430> and his laws.<WH8451>
And Moses'<WH4872> father<WH2859> in law<WH2859> said<WH559> to him, The thing<WH1697> that you do<WH6213> is not good.<WH2896>

You will surely wear<WH5034> away, both<WH1571> you, and this<WH2088> people<WH5971> that is with you: for this thing<WH1697> is too heavy<WH3515> for you; you are not able<WH3201> to perform<WH6213> it yourself alone.<WH905>

Listen<WH8085> now<WH6258> to my voice,<WH6963> I will give you counsel,<WH3289> and God<WH430> shall be with you: Be you for the people<WH5971> to God-ward,<WH4136> <WH430> that you may bring<WH935> the causes<WH1697> to God:<WH430>
And you shall teach<WH2094> them ordinances<WH2706> and laws,<WH8451> and shall show<WH3045> them the way<WH1870> wherein they must walk,<WH3212> and the work<WH4639> that they must do.<WH6213>

Moreover you shall provide<WH2372> out of all<WH3605> the people<WH5971> able<WH2428> men,<WH582> such as fear<WH3373> God,<WH430> men<WH582> of truth,<WH571> hating<WH8130> covetousness;<WH1215> and place<WH7760> such over<WH5921> them, to be rulers<WH8269> of thousands,<WH505> and rulers<WH8269> of hundreds,<WH3967> rulers<WH8269> of fifties,<WH2572> and rulers<WH8269> of tens:<WH6235>

And let them judge<WH8199> the people<WH5971> at all<WH3605> seasons:<WH6256> and it shall be, that every<WH3605> great<WH1419> matter<WH1697> they shall bring<WH935> to you, but every<WH3605> small<WH6996> matter<WH1697> they shall judge:<WH8199> so shall it be easier<WH7043> for yourself, and they shall bear<WH5375> the burden with you.

If<WH518> you shall do<WH6213> this<WH2088> thing,<WH1697> and God<WH430> command<WH6680> you so, then you shall be able<WH3201> to endure,<WH5975> and all<WH3605> this<WH2088> people<WH5971> shall also<WH1571> go<WH935> to their place<WH4725> in peace.<WH7965>
So Moses<WH4872> listened<WH8085> to the voice<WH6963> of his father<WH2859> in law,<WH2859> and did<WH6213> all<WH3605> that he had said.<WH559>

And Moses<WH4872> chose<WH977> able<WH2428> men<WH582> out of all<WH3605> Israel,<WH3478> and made<WH5414> them heads<WH7218> over<WH5921> the people,<WH5971> rulers<WH8269> of thousands,<WH505> rulers<WH8269> of hundreds,<WH3967> rulers<WH8269> of fifties,<WH2572> and rulers<WH8269> of tens.<WH6235>

And they judged<WH8199> the people<WH5971> at all<WH3605> seasons:<WH6256> the hard<WH7186> causes<WH1697> they brought<WH935> to Moses,<WH4872> but every<WH3605> small<WH6996> matter<WH1697> they judged<WH8199> themselves.<WH1992>
And Moses<WH4872> let his father<WH2859> in law<WH2859> depart;<WH7971> and he went<WH3212> his way into<WH413> his own land.<WH776>
